mapper.insert: INSERT INTO APPLICANT (APL_NO, RCRT_NO, DEPT, DEPT_CD, RCRT_CD, APL_PW, FIRST_PASS_YN, SECOND_PASS_YN, FINAL_PASS_YN, PSWD, APL_NM, APL_BRDT, GNDR_CD, ADDR, ADDR_DETAIL, APL_EML, APL_TEL, LAST_ACBG, APL_IMG, APL_CRT_DT) VALUES (#{aplNo}, #{rcrtNo}, #{dept}, #{deptCd}, #{rcrtCd}, #{aplPw}, #{firstPassYn}, #{secondPassYn}, #{finalPassYn}, #{pswd}, #{aplNm}, #{aplBrdt}, #{gndrCd}, #{addr}, #{addrDetail}, #{aplEml}, #{aplTel}, #{lastAcbg}, #{aplImg}, #{aplCrtDt})
